speed_limit.description: Indicates the maximum speed limit allowed on the road. Examples: 'Speed Limit 25 mph', 'Maximum Speed 55', 'Min Speed 40', 'Speed Limit 70 km/h'.

weight_limit.description: Specifies the maximum weight allowed for vehicles on a certain road or bridge. Examples: 'Weight Limit 10 Tons', 'No Vehicles Over 5,000 lbs', 'Bridge Limit 8 Tons'.

height_limit.description: Warns drivers about height restrictions for tunnels, bridges, or overpasses. Examples: 'Low Clearance 12' 6"', 'No Vehicles Over 10 ft Tall', 'Max Height 4m'.

lane_control.description: Governs how lanes should be used and which directions are allowed. Examples: 'Left Lane Must Turn Left', 'Right Lane Must Turn Right', 'Merge Left', 'HOV Lane Only', 'Trucks Right Lane Only'.

turn_restriction.description: Restricts turning movements at intersections. Examples: 'No U-Turn', 'No Left Turn', 'No Right Turn', 'Left Turn Yield on Green', 'No Turn on Red', 'Right Lane Must Turn Right'.

stop_yield.description: Regulates right-of-way and stopping behavior at intersections. Examples: 'STOP', 'YIELD', 'All-Way Stop', 'Yield to Pedestrians', 'Wrong Way', 'Do Not Enter'.

parking_rules.description: Indicates parking restrictions and permitted parking zones. Examples: 'No Parking', 'No Parking Anytime', 'Handicap Parking Only', '15-Minute Parking'.

pedestrian_control.description: Controls pedestrian and bicycle traffic at intersections. Examples: 'Stop Here on Red', 'Pedestrian Crossing', 'Wait for Green', 'Push Button for Walk Signal'.

highway_exit.description: Provides information about highway exits and upcoming road changes. Examples: 'Exit 45', 'Next Exit 2 Miles', 'Rest Area 1 Mile', 'Gas - Food - Lodging Next Right'.

hazard_warning.description: Warns drivers of hazardous road conditions ahead. Examples: 'Slippery When Wet', 'Bridge May Ice in Winter', 'Steep Hill Ahead', 'Falling Rocks'.

construction_zone.description: Notifies drivers of roadwork and potential delays. Examples: 'Road Work Ahead', 'Detour', 'Lane Closed', 'Expect Delays'.

school_zone.description: Notifies drivers of entering an area near school where drivers should significantly reduce the speed and be extra cautious as children may be present crossing the street. Examples: 'School Crossing', 'Slow School Zone', 'Watch Out For Children'.

special_vehicle_rules.description: Applies to certain vehicle types such as trucks and hazardous materials. Examples: 'Trucks Use Low Gear', 'No Hazardous Materials', 'Snow Chains Required', 'Weigh Station Ahead'.

custom_signs.description: Special or localized road signs for safety or regulations. Examples: 'Local Traffic Only', 'Deaf Child Area', 'Speed Bumps Ahead', 'Tsunami Evacuation Route'.
